Heritage of Blades.name: Heritage of Blades
Heritage of Blades.flavor: Iridescent blades of force surround you. They parry for your allies and cut your foes.
Heritage of Blades.effect:
Your allies within 2 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense.
    You can use a minor action once on your turn to deal force damage to an enemy of your choice within 5 squares. You deal force damage equal to 2d6 + your Wisdom modifier.

Arcane Tanglestep.name: Arcane Tanglestep
Arcane Tanglestep.flavor: A swirl of your blade creates a magic snare and two entangled portals. You step through your portal as the enemy feels the yank of the snare.
Arcane Tanglestep.trigger: An enemy you have marked hits an ally with an attack that does not include you
Arcane Tanglestep.effect: Instead of using your normal aegis of assault immediate reaction or aegis of warding immediate interrupt, you teleport yourself to any location within a number of squares equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier, and you teleport the enemy that triggered the power to a square adjacent to you.

Four Corners Attack.name: Four Corners Attack
Four Corners Attack.flavor: You are everywhere at once, your blade cutting into your foe from high and low, and from all sides.
Four Corners Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier + Wisdom modifier damage. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Four Corners Attack.secondaryAttack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Intelligence vs. Reflex, or Intelligence vs. Will
Four Corners Attack.secondaryOnHit (Fortitude): If the attack hits the target’s Fortitude defense, the target takes 1[W] damage and is knocked prone.
Four Corners Attack.secondaryOnHit (Reflex): If the attack hits the target’s Reflex defense, the target takes 1[W] damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Four Corners Attack.secondaryOnHit (Will): If the attack hits the target’s Will defense, the target takes 1[W] damage and is dazed until the end of your next turn.
